Class Paddle

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.javalabra.logic.Paddle

  • public class Paddle
extends Object
    This class is mainly responsible for holding data associated with the paddle and collision detection

      • collidesWithHighEdge

        public boolean collidesWithHighEdge(int prevBallLow,
                           int ballLow,
                           int ballLeft,
                           int ballRight)
        Returns true if the ball is about to collide with the high edge of the paddle.
        Parameters:
        prevBallLow - coordinate before collision
        ballLow - coordinate of the low edge of the ball
        ballLeft - coordinate of the left edge of the ball
        ballRight - coordinate of the right edge of the ball
        Returns:
        true if collision is about to happen, false otherwise
